testcase.name: Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Newsletter Inbox Workflow > should display newsletters in inbox and allow filtering

Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Newsletter Inbox Workflow > should filter newsletters by read status

Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Newsletter Inbox Workflow > should handle newsletter deletion

Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Newsletter Detail Workflow > should allow adding and removing tags
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Newsletter Detail Workflow > should allow favoriting newsletters
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Newsletter Detail Workflow > should handle newsletter sharing
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Newsletter Detail Workflow > should display related newsletters
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Error Handling > should handle API errors gracefully
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Error Handling > should handle network errors
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Error Handling > should handle empty states
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Loading States > should show loading state while fetching newsletters
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Loading States > should show skeleton loading for newsletter detail
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Responsive Behavior > should adapt to mobile viewport
Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Responsive Behavior > should adapt to tablet viewport

Newsletter Workflow Integration Tests > Performance > should implement infinite scrolling
